snippet: The president made no mention of same-sex marriage in his first outing at a fund-raising brunch in an affluent Seattle neighborhood. But signs of his supporters' approval was evident.
abstract: The president made no mention of same-sex marriage in his first outing at a fund-raising brunch in an affluent Seattle neighborhood. But signs of his supporters' approval was evident.

headline.main: Without Mentioning It, Obama Gets Applause for Gay Marriage Stand

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
